text: [Music]
[Music]
state trumpeter causal cavalry sounding
the Royal salute
so the queen who celebrated her 93rd
birthday in april this year being
accompanied to the State Opening of 2019
by Prince of Wales the longest-serving
heir apparent in British history and the
longest-serving Prince of Wales that's
ever been in the history of the UK and
the Duchess of Cornwall who for the last
six years now has been accompanying the
Prince of Wales to the State Opening of
parliament and the sovereigns escort
provided as usual by the house of
cavalry The Life Guards and the Blues
and Royals for making their way from
Buckingham Palace on this rather wet day
in October to head towards Admiralty
Arch along the MAL on the fringes there
of Saint James's Park past the Canada
gate and along the MAL up towards Horse
Guards on that relatively short journey
down to the houses of parliament and the
Palace of Westminster
